tool_description: get a 14 day sun hours forecast worldwide from weatheronline
name: Sun Hours Forecast
title: Sun Hours Forecast

api_list.name: List of all countries
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://weatheronline2-sun-hours-forecast-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/countrycitylist"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "weatheronline2-sun-hours-forecast-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://weatheronline2-sun-hours-forecast-v1.p.rapidapi.com/api/countrycitylist"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "weatheronline2-sun-hours-forecast-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
